instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.message:
Hello I need help how to solve this problem.Te escribo español hacerme entender.El pad SMC_TM se daño por corrosion, por lo tanto.Yo hago un puente desde R5177 al pin smc pin10.Sin embargo el pad SMC_TM tambien va al pin 9 J6100, como hago para llegar desde el pad SMC_TM hasta J6100? tambien me puedes indicar que significa la linea azul que sale del pad SMC_TM del boardview .Muchas gracias, adjunto imagenes[ATTACH type="full"]60619[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH type="full"]60620[/ATTACH]

No need to route SMC_TMS to J6100.
You can even remove J6100, if you note it corroded.

No hace falta llevar SMC_TMS hasta J6100.
Puedes incluso quitar J6100, si lo notas corroido.

Por cierto, usa OpenBoardView; free tu download from Internet.
Las capturas de arriba se parecen mas a cuadros de Picasso que a boardview...
